name: querybuilder-workspace
author: Miguel E. Llambías Llansó
description: QueryBuilder for SQL and NoSQL databases - Development Workspace

scripts.docs:generate: documentation build packages/@querybuilder/core/querybuilder.js -f html -o docs/api --project-name "QueryBuilder Documentation" --github --sort-order alpha --document-exported
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:generate
scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs:build && npm run docs:serve
scripts.vitepress:build: npm run vitepress:generate && cd docs-vitepress && npx vitepress build
scripts.docs:update: npm run vitepress:generate && npm run vitepress:build && echo 'Documentación actualizada. Presiona Ctrl+R en el servidor para ver los cambios.'
scripts.docs:watch: nodemon --watch src --watch packages --ext js --exec "npm run docs:update"
scripts.docs:full-restart: npm run vitepress:generate && npm run vitepress:build && node serve-docs-es.mjs 3013
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:core && npm run pack:mysql && npm run pack:postgresql && npm run pack:mongodb && npm run pack:sqlite && npm run pack:chroma && npm run pack:redis && npm run pack:cassandra
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:core && npm run publish:mysql && npm run publish:postgresql && npm run publish:mongodb && npm run publish:sqlite && npm run publish:chroma && npm run publish:redis && npm run publish:cassandra
